Articles.Content:
I'm watching the KSPTV 1.2 demo and he's demonstrating a vessel in orbit with a pilot and advanced probe core controlling a rover on the surface. The ship has a Mobile Processing Lab on it and this gave me an idea: it would be interesting if probes could transmit science to other ships instead of directly to KSC. In the case above, the probe could transmit science data to the orbiting ship, which could then process the data in its MPL. 

So, what would this require? An advanced probe core and a pilot are required to *control* a probe without KSC connection, so I'd say an advanced probe core and scientist would be needed remotely gather data.

Does anyone have any thoughts on this?
